def_cn: (置于形容词和名词前构成形容词，指不具有某一特质或特定方面)表示“非”，“无”
def_en: Non- is used in front of adjectives and nouns to form adjectives that describe something as not having a particular quality or feature.

def_cn: (置于名词前构成名词，指某一特定行动尚未或不会发生)表示“不”，“未”
def_en: Non- is used in front of nouns to form nouns which refer to situations where a particular action has not or will not take place.

def_cn: (置于名词前构成名词，指不属于某一特定群体或类别的人)表示“非”，“不”
def_en: Non- is used in front of nouns to form nouns which refer to people who do not belong to a particular group or category.
